value:
I am proud to serve my queen. To a
knight of Crimea, such a responsibility
imparts nothing short of joy.

I was awarded this set of silver
tableware from His Majesty with my
knighthood. I could never part with it.

The Royal Knights of Crimea will not
waste a chance to improve ourselves.
It is how we will avoid another defeat.

Mixing this powder imparts a specific
color to my flares only discernible by
our allies.$k$pThis allows me to command even
distant soldiers.

This lance is a physical manifestation
of my loyalty and honor. I daresay it
is the most splendid in all of Crimea!

I am Geoffrey, a lance paladin of
Crimea. Allow me to deliver a gift
from $Nf.

I will eliminate all obstacles in Queen
Elincia's path toward Crimea's
restoration!

Have you the will to surrender? Your
life will be spared if you do. Her
Majesty frowns upon needless death.

Do not panic! The enemy is looking
for an opening. Should we act rashly
now, we will fall right into their hands.

I am at a loss for words... Thank you.
Apologies. I suspect Bastian could
have said that much better than I did.

The leader of the Royal Knights of
Crimea has arrived! Soldiers of the
enemy, hear me and surrender at once!

I am hardly suited for the noble life.
My older sister, Lucia, seems much
more at home in the royal palace.$k$pThe title of House Delbray has felt
like a weight on my back, if anything.
But I am thankful for my origin.$k$pFirst, it led me to meet my lifelong
friend Bastian. Second, I met a queen
deserving of my eternal loyalty.$k$pHow brightly did she illuminate all
Crimea, even as a princess! Her
radiance is difficult to describe...$k$pWith kindness and sagacity in equal
measure, she can be summed up in
a single word: perfect.$k$pWhen the fighting became fierce and
our overly optimistic plans fell apart,
she rallied us on many an occasion.$k$pSupporter became supported. I soon
realized that Crimea and its people's
burdens weighed heavily on her.$k$pBastian and Lucia realized this too.
Indeed, I shed many a tear when she
finally ascended to the throne.$k$pIt was then that I declared to the
gods above my intention to serve and
protect her with my life!$k$pYou must have a reason to fight,
Summoner. Perhaps it is a topic for
after the next battle ends.
Prepare yourself for justice!
Knights! To me!
Hold the line!
For Her Majesty!
My queen...
I am Geoffrey, commander of the Royal Knights of Crimea.
Ah! That was unexpected. I did not take you for the clandestine sort.
Come what may, I will remain by Queen Elincia's side. It is my honor and sworn duty.
Bastian may come off as insincere, but he is actually a considerate and reliable friend.
I would willingly die for my country. My sister would do the same.
Queen Elincia... I swear that l shall never leave your side again!
I will serve you in the same way I serve my liege. For you, I am prepared to lay down my life.
Mm.
Truly?
I will give my all.
